about.title: About L-Ectric
paragraphs: My name is Liran, and I bring a unique combination of two worlds – experience as a professional electrician in the field, alongside significant background from the tech industry.

The transition and experience in tech sharpened my exceptionally high work standards: attention to detail, systems thinking, meticulous planning, and solving problems in a smart, non-improvised way. For me, electrical work isn't just about "connecting and making it work" – it's about proper, safe, and aesthetic execution that lasts for years.

I believe in reliable, transparent, and professional service. The client should understand what's being done in their home or business, why it's being done – and what it costs. No games, no shortcuts, no surprises.
Every job is performed with full responsibility, emphasis on safety, clean work, and personal service at eye level.
L-Ectric was founded from a desire to bring a different level of professionalism to the market – smart, organized, and precise electrical service, with genuine human connection.
